scanner - Variable in class app.GameMode
 
screens - Variable in class appv2.core.view.MasterController
List of all screens in the application.
We use this list to keep track of all rendered screens, attach them to the master scene and to be able to destroy them when they are no longer needed.

Selects the next valid player in the order of the player array.
selectNextValidPlayer() - Method in class appv2.core.GameMode
Selects the next valid player in the order of the player array.
Valid meaning that the player is not knocked out nor has a message for the next turn.

setKnockedOut(boolean, boolean, String) - Method in class appv2.core.PlayerController
Implements the default behavior of the player when he is knocked out of the round.
This also includes discarding his hand and table card to his discarded cards pile.
